Table_Binary.description: The records count is the number of rows in this table

Field_Binary.name: TIMESTAMP
Field_Binary.description: Time that the integration began according to S/C clock (uncorrected)

Field_Binary.name: ET
Field_Binary.description: Time that the integration began (corrected for SCLK errors by SCLK kernel)

Field_Binary.name: UTC
Field_Binary.description: Time that the integration began (corrected for SCLK errors by SCLK kernel)

Field_Binary.name: MIRROR_DN
Field_Binary.description: Mirror position at beginning of this integration

Field_Binary.name: MIRROR_DEG
Field_Binary.description: Mirror position at beginning of this integration

Field_Binary.name: FOV_DEG
Field_Binary.description: Instrument field of view center position at beginning of integration (=MIRROR_THIS_DEG*2)

Field_Binary.name: LYA_CENTROID
Field_Binary.description: Shift of wavelength scale calculated from centroid

Field_Binary.name: CASE_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: Case temperature in DN

Field_Binary.name: DET_TEMP
Field_Binary.description: Case temperature in DN

Table_Binary.description: The records count is the number of rows in this table

Field_Binary.name: XUV
Field_Binary.description: Which channel this is

Field_Binary.name: LENGTH
Field_Binary.description: Length of entire science image to which this segment belongs

Field_Binary.name: IMAGE_NUMBER
Field_Binary.description: Series number of this image

Field_Binary.name: AVERAGE
Field_Binary.description: "Average DN value of last packet of observation, not significant"

Field_Binary.name: CHECKSUM
Field_Binary.description: "Checksum of last packet of observation, not significant, not being checked"

Field_Binary.name: START_TIME
Field_Binary.description: Time when image set containing this segment was initiated

Field_Binary.name: START_TIME__SUB
Field_Binary.description: Time when image set containing this segment was initiated

Field_Binary.name: CADENCE
Field_Binary.description: Image cadence parameter for this image set

Field_Binary.name: NUMBER
Field_Binary.description: Total number of commanded images for this set (equal to number of integrations)

Field_Binary.name: INT_TIME
Field_Binary.description: Image integration time parameter for this image set

Field_Binary.name: MIRROR_POS
Field_Binary.description: Position of mirror when image set began

Field_Binary.name: STEP_NUM
Field_Binary.description: Value of mirror step number when this image was initiated

Field_Binary.name: STEP_SIZE
Field_Binary.description: Value of mirror step size when this image was initiated

Field_Binary.name: STEP_INT
Field_Binary.description: Value of mirror step interval when this image was initiated

Field_Binary.name: BIN_SHIFT
Field_Binary.description: Offset between expected lyman alpha line and calculated

Field_Binary.name: OBS_ID
Field_Binary.description: Value of Obs ID telemetry point when this image was initiated

Field_Binary.name: FUV_BAD_PIXEL_MASK
Field_Binary.description: "Each detector has a list of pixels that are bad and those pixels are never included in the binned data. This bad pixel masking can be disabled, in which case all pixels are used."

Field_Binary.name: MUV_BAD_PIXEL_MASK
Field_Binary.description: "Each detector has a list of pixels that are bad and those pixels are never included in the binned data. This bad pixel masking can be disabled, in which case all pixels are used."

Field_Binary.name: DATA_COMPRESSION
Field_Binary.description: "If data compression is on, all detector data will be sent in 16 bit pixels. If compression is off, the data can be up to 32 bits wide and it will be different for each bin. Compression should always be enabled unless taking a full frame image."

Field_Binary.name: TEST_PATTERN
Field_Binary.description: There are two types of test patterns that can be produced. The 16 bit pattern rolls over at 65535 and the 12 bit pattern rolls over at 4095. This indicates which type will be used for the next test pattern image.

Field_Binary.name: ON_CHIP_WINDOWING
Field_Binary.description: "In linear bin mode, the Detector FPGA can read the entire array into SRAM and bin it from there, or it can only read out the pixels in the defined window. Running with the window enabled can save readout time."

Field_Binary.name: BIN_TYPE
Field_Binary.description: "There are two types of binning, linear and non-linear. This indicates which the detector will use for the next set of images."

Field_Binary.name: SCAN_MODE
Field_Binary.description: "The detector can peform three different types of readouts, in addition to generating a test pattern. This indicates which readout will be used for the next set of images."

Field_Binary.name: TIME_FLAG
Field_Binary.description: Indicates if time was sync'd when this packet was logged (may be Synced/Freewheel)

Field_Binary.name: SHUTTER_ON
Field_Binary.description: Shutter cycle on time for this image set

Field_Binary.name: SHUTTER_OFF
Field_Binary.description: Shutter cycle off time for this image set

Field_Binary.name: SHUTTER_NUM
Field_Binary.description: Shutter cycle number for this image set

Field_Binary.name: SET_TOTAL
Field_Binary.description: "It is possible that not all commanded images are received in the SDRAM. This is the actual number received, out of the commanded"

Field_Binary.name: BIN_X_ROW
Field_Binary.description: Image bin table for this image set

Field_Binary.name: BIN_Y_ROW
Field_Binary.description: Image bin table row for this image set

Field_Binary.name: MCP_GAIN
Field_Binary.description: "MCP value when this image set was initiated. (Commanded value, use that DN conversion)"

Field_Binary.name: SCI_SEG_TOTAL
Field_Binary.description: Series number of this segment (eg 1 out of 4)

Field_Binary.name: SCI_SEG_LENGTH
Field_Binary.description: Length of this segment of the science image

Field_Binary.name: SCI_SEG_NUM
Field_Binary.description: Number of segments for this image

Table_Binary.description: The records count is the number of rows in this table

Field_Binary.name: SPABINWIDTH
Field_Binary.description: "Width of each spatial bin in pixels, one entry for each bin, transmitted or not"

Field_Binary.name: SPABINTRANSMIT
Field_Binary.description: "1 if bin is transmitted, 0 if not. Total number of 1 entries set equals the number of spatial bins in the file"

Field_Binary.name: SPEBINWIDTH
Field_Binary.description: "Width of each spectral bin in pixels, one entry for each bin, transmitted or not"

Field_Binary.name: SPEBINTRANSMIT
Field_Binary.description: "1 if bin is transmitted, 0 if not. Total number of 1 entries set equals the number of spatial bins in the file"

Field_Binary.name: SPAPIXLO
Field_Binary.description: Lowest numbered pixel in each transmitted spatial bin

Field_Binary.name: SPAPIXHI
Field_Binary.description: Highest numbered pixel in each transmitted spatial bin

Field_Binary.name: SPEPIXLO
Field_Binary.description: Lowest numbered pixel in each transmitted spectral bin

Field_Binary.name: SPEPIXHI
Field_Binary.description: Highest numbered pixel in each transmitted spectral bin

Table_Binary.description: The records count is the number of rows in this table

Field_Binary.name: PIXEL_VEC
Field_Binary.description: Unit vector from spacecraft along lines of sight for 4 corners and center of each spatial bin

Field_Binary.name: PIXEL_CORNER_RA
Field_Binary.description: Right ascension of line of sight of 4 corners and center of each spatial bin

Field_Binary.name: PIXEL_CORNER_DEC
Field_Binary.description: Declination of line of sight of 4 corners and center of each spatial bin

Field_Binary.name: PIXEL_CORNER_LAT
Field_Binary.description: "Geodetic Latitude of tangent or impact point of line of sight with Mars ellipsoid, for 4 corners and center of each spatial bin"

Field_Binary.name: PIXEL_CORNER_LON
Field_Binary.description: "East Longitude of tangent or impact point of line of sight with Mars ellipsoid, for 4 corners and center of each spatial bin"

Field_Binary.name: PIXEL_CORNER_LON
Field_Binary.description: "East Longitude of tangent or impact point of line of sight with Mars ellipsoid, for 4 corners and center of each spatial bin"

Field_Binary.name: PIXEL_CORNER_MRH_ALT
Field_Binary.description: "Altitude of tangent point, or zero if line of sight hits ellipsoid, for 4 corners and center of each spatial bin"

Field_Binary.name: PIXEL_CORNER_MRH_ALT_RATE
Field_Binary.description: Time rate of change of altitude of tangent point

Field_Binary.name: PIXEL_CORNER_LOS
Field_Binary.description: Distance from spacecraft to tangent or impact point

Field_Binary.name: PIXEL_INCIDENCE_ANGLE
Field_Binary.description: "Angle between surface normal and vector to Sun, at tangent or impact point"

Field_Binary.name: PIXEL_EMISSION_ANGLE
Field_Binary.description: "Angle between surface normal and vector to spacecraft, at tangent or impact point"

Field_Binary.name: PIXEL_ZENITH_ANGLE
Field_Binary.description: Angle between pixel look direction and spacecraft zenith (90deg plus lookdown angle)

Field_Binary.name: PIXEL_PHASE_ANGLE
Field_Binary.description: Angle between spacecraft and sun as seen from tangent or impact point

Table_Binary.name: data_PixelGeometry
Table_Binary.description: The records count is the number of rows in this table

Field_Binary.name: SUB_SPACECRAFT_LAT
Field_Binary.description: Geodetic Latitude of subspacecraft point

Field_Binary.name: SUB_SPACECRAFT_LON
Field_Binary.description: East Longitude of subspacecraft point

Field_Binary.name: SUB_SOLAR_LAT
Field_Binary.description: Geodetic Latitude of subsolar point

Field_Binary.name: SUB_SOLAR_LAT
Field_Binary.description: East Longitude of subsolar point

Field_Binary.name: SPACECRAFT_ALT
Field_Binary.description: Altitude of spacecraft above reference Mars ellipsoid

Field_Binary.name: V_SPACECRAFT
Field_Binary.description: Position of spacecraft relative to Mars center of mass

Field_Binary.name: V_SPACECRAFT_RATE
Field_Binary.description: Velocity of spacecraft

Field_Binary.name: V_SUN
Field_Binary.description: Position of Sun relative to Mars center of mass

Field_Binary.name: V_SUN_RATE
Field_Binary.description: Velocity of Sun

Field_Binary.name: VX_SPACECRAFT
Field_Binary.description: Direction of spacecraft X axis

Field_Binary.name: VY_SPACECRAFT
Field_Binary.description: Direction of spacecraft Y axis

Field_Binary.name: VZ_SPACECRAFT
Field_Binary.description: Direction of spacecraft Z axis

Field_Binary.name: VX_INSTRUMENT
Field_Binary.description: "Direction of instrument field of view X axis, including scan mirror rotation. This is the instrument spatial direction."

Field_Binary.name: VY_INSTRUMENT
Field_Binary.description: "Direction of instrument field of view Y axis, including scan mirror rotation. This is the instrument scan direction"

Field_Binary.name: VZ_INSTRUMENT
Field_Binary.description: "Direction of instrument field of view Z axis, including scan mirror rotation. This is the instrument boresight."

Field_Binary.name: V_SPACECRAFT_MSO
Field_Binary.description: Position of spacecraft relative to Mars center of mass

Field_Binary.name: V_SPACECRAFT_RATE_MSO
Field_Binary.description: Velocity of spacecraft

Field_Binary.name: V_SPACECRAFT_INERTIAL
Field_Binary.description: Position of spacecraft relative to Mars center of mass

Field_Binary.name: V_SPACECRAFT_RATE_INERTIAL
Field_Binary.description: Velocity of spacecraft

Field_Binary.name: V_SPACECRAFT_INERTIAL_FRAME
Field_Binary.description: Spice name of inertial frame

Field_Binary.name: V_SPACECRAFT_INERTIAL_CENTER
Field_Binary.description: Spice name of inertial center of mass

Field_Binary.name: V_SUN_MSO
Field_Binary.description: Position of Sun relative to Mars center of mass

Field_Binary.name: V_SUN_RATE_MSO
Field_Binary.description: Velocity of Sun

Field_Binary.name: VX_SPACECRAFT_MSO
Field_Binary.description: Direction of spacecraft X axis

Field_Binary.name: VY_SPACECRAFT_MSO
Field_Binary.description: Direction of spacecraft Y axis

Field_Binary.name: VZ_SPACECRAFT_MSO
Field_Binary.description: Direction of spacecraft Z axis

Field_Binary.name: VX_INSTRUMENT_MSO
Field_Binary.description: "Direction of instrument field of view X axis, including scan mirror rotation. This is the instrument spatial direction."

Field_Binary.name: VY_INSTRUMENT_MSO
Field_Binary.description: "Direction of instrument field of view Y axis, including scan mirror rotation. This is the instrument scan direction"

Field_Binary.name: VZÄ_INSTRUMENT_MSO
Field_Binary.description: "Direction of instrument field of view Z axis, including scan mirror rotation. This is the instrument boresight."

Field_Binary.name: VX_SPACECRAFT_INERTIAL
Field_Binary.description: Direction of spacecraft X axis

Field_Binary.name: VY_SPACECRAFT_INERTIAL
Field_Binary.description: Direction of spacecraft Y axis

Field_Binary.name: VZ_SPACECRAFT_INERTIAL
Field_Binary.description: Direction of spacecraft Z axis

Field_Binary.name: VX_INSTRUMENT_INERTIAL
Field_Binary.description: "Direction of instrument field of view X axis, including scan mirror rotation. This is the instrument spatial direction."

Field_Binary.name: VY_INSTRUMENT_INERTIAL
Field_Binary.description: "Direction of instrument field of view Y axis, including scan mirror rotation. This is the instrument scan direction"

Field_Binary.name: VZ_INSTRUMENT_INERTIAL
Field_Binary.description: "Direction of instrument field of view Z axis, including scan mirror rotation. This is the instrument boresight."

Field_Binary.name: INST_SUN_ANGLE
Field_Binary.description: "Angle between instrument boresight (taking into account mirror position) and Sun, deg"

Table_Binary.name: data_Observation
Table_Binary.description: The records count is the number of rows in this table

Field_Binary.name: PRODUCT_ID
Field_Binary.description: Original filename of this product

Field_Binary.name: COLLECTION_ID
Field_Binary.description: PDS collection ID (currently unused)

Field_Binary.name: BUNDLE_ID
Field_Binary.description: PDS bundle ID (currently unused)

Field_Binary.name: CODE_SVN_REVISION
Field_Binary.description: SVN revision number of code used to produce this product

Field_Binary.name: ANC_SVN_REVISION
Field_Binary.description: SVN revision number of ancillary data used to produce this product

Field_Binary.name: PRODUCT_CREATION_DATE
Field_Binary.description: Product creation date

Field_Binary.name: OBSERVATION_TYPE
Field_Binary.description: Observation type string

Field_Binary.name: MISSION_PHASE
Field_Binary.description: Mission phase string

Field_Binary.name: TARGET_NAME
Field_Binary.description: Target name string

Field_Binary.name: ORBIT_SEGMENT
Field_Binary.description: "Orbit segment (periapse, apoapse, corona etc, currently 0)"

Field_Binary.name: ORBIT_NUMBER
Field_Binary.description: "Orbit number (MOI is start of orbit 1, orbit number changes 30min before each periapse)"

Field_Binary.name: SOLAR_LONGITUDE
Field_Binary.description: "Solar longitude, 0deg=Martian spring equinox, 90deg=solstice, etc"

Field_Binary.name: GRATING_SELECT
Field_Binary.description: Grating select (one of 'ECHELLE'/'LOWRES')

Field_Binary.name: KEYHOLE_SELECT
Field_Binary.description: Keyhole select (one of 'LARGE'/'SMALL'/'NEITHER')

Field_Binary.name: BIN_PATTERN_INDEX
Field_Binary.description: Name of linear or nonlinear binning table used for this observation.

Field_Binary.name: WAVELENGTH
Field_Binary.description: Wavelength of center of each bin

Field_Binary.name: WAVELENGTH_WIDTH
Field_Binary.description: Wavelength width of each bin
